name: Divine Soul
description: Your magic is a gift from the divine, allowing you to blend sorcerer and cleric spellcasting.

1.name: Divine Magic
1.description: When learning or replacing spells, you may choose from the cleric list; choose a divine affinity that grants an extra spell.

1.name: Favored by the Gods
1.description: If you fail a saving throw or miss an attack, roll 2d4 and add it, once per short or long rest.

6.name: Empowered Healing
6.description: Spend 1 sorcery point to reroll any number of dice to determine hit points restored by a spell you or an ally casts within 5 feet.

14.name: Otherworldly Wings
14.description: As a bonus action, sprout spectral wings that grant a 30-foot flying speed.

18.name: Unearthly Recovery
18.description: When below half your hit points, use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to half your maximum once per long rest.

choices.name: Divine Affinity
choices.description: Select the nature of your divine power.
